up_id.title: up_id
up_id.description: Uplink frame unique ID for reply

fport.title: front
fport.description: The FPort value that will be used when sending a frame

imme.title: imme
imme.description: Immediate. Send data immediate (for Class C or for Class A if up_id specified)

nodel.title: nodel
nodel.description: Not delete. Do not delete from queue after join/rejoin

fpend.title: fpend
fpend.description: FPending. Set FPending bit for immediate downlink

prio.title: prio
prio.description: Prio. Set priority for send via queue (0-low, 1-middle, 2-hight)
